Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+F.EXPLANATION: Percentage of follow-up services completed successfully compared to the total number of follow-up services requested.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+F.FORMULA: (Number of Completed Follow-Up Services / Total Number of Follow-Up Services Requested) * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+F.EXPLANATION: Satisfaction level of customers with the follow-up services they receive, typically measured through post-service surveys.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+F.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score from Customers Regarding Follow-Up Services

Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+F.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to respond to follow-up service requests from customers, indicating the efficiency of the follow-up process.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+F.FORMULA: Average Time from Follow-Up Service Request to Response

Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+F.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred to provide follow-up services to each customer, including labor, materials, and administrative expenses.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+F.FORMULA: Total Cost of Follow-Up Services / Total Number of Customers Receiving Follow-Up Services

Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+F.EXPLANATION: Measure of how effective follow-up services are in resolving customer issues and achieving service goals, based on feedback and performance evaluations.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+F.FORMULA: Average Effectiveness Score from Follow-Up Service Evaluations

Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+F.KPIS: Number of repeat follow-up service requests.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+F.EXPLANATION: Total number of follow-up service requests made by the same customers, indicating the effectiveness of initial follow-up services.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+F.FORMULA: Total Number of Repeat Follow-Up Service Requests

Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+F.KPIS: Follow-up service impact on customer loyalty.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+F.EXPLANATION: Assessment of how follow-up services influence customer loyalty and retention, measured through customer feedback and repeat business.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+F.FORMULA: (Change in Customer Loyalty Score After Follow-Up Services - Before Follow-Up Services) / Customer Loyalty Score Before Follow-Up Services * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+F.EXPLANATION: Degree to which follow-up services adhere to established standards and guidelines, measured through audits or assessments.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+F.FORMULA: (Number of Follow-Up Services Complying with Standards / Total Number of Follow-Up Services) * 100
